data.message: see what the problem with people these days they're too judgemental don't assume because someone's a rapper that they are stuck up and don't have no heart even though they do their part and Rap their beautiful art every day they're just like you and me they shed tears they feel fear never compare to what they don't show the word of the wise do not judge because you dont know!!!

replies.message:
Snap...they should be able to step in his shoes and do that walk he did ,to get to the now,the who he is today...but haters will always be haters and media portraying negative image or false story's doesn't help either...
But ppl like us see beyond that😏  Marshall is a great guy,I admire him alot,"they see him rolling they hating"😂
